thread.title: Bakery owners refuse to pay damages in gay wedding cake case

title: Bakery owners refuse to pay damages in gay wedding cake case
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
The owners of a Portland-area bakery are refusing to pay $135,000 in state-ordered damages to a same-sex couple who were denied service. â€¦...
